Package ch.zh.transferclient.properties

Class Properties

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.zh.transferclient.properties.Properties
  • public class Properties
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to construct the properties object.
    Version:
    2.4
    Author:
    Daniel Bierer (Statistisches Amt des Kantons ZÃ¼rich)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private boolean archive_datafiles
      Indicator which indicates whether transmitted files should be archived or not.
      private long delay
      The delay in milliseconds between the termination of one execution and the commencement of the next.
      private java.lang.String folder_results
      Folder in which the end user puts the files with the results.
      private Properties.Language language
      Language to be used in the graphical user interface.
      private boolean log_overwrite
      Indicator which indicates whether the log should be overwritten for every new session or not.
      private boolean log_suppress_debug
      Indicator which indicates whether debug messages in the log should be suppressed or not.
      private int number_of_table_entries
      Number of table entries.
      private java.lang.String sedex_dir_outbox
      Outbox folder of the sedex adapter.
      private java.lang.String sedex_dir_receipts
      Receipts folder of the sedex adapter.
      private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> sedex_recipient_ids
      Sedex IDs of the recipients.
      private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> sedex_recipient_labels
      Labels of the recipients.
      private java.lang.String sedex_sender_id
      Sedex ID of the sender.
      private java.lang.String target_time
      Time when the transfer client will be activated under the autoactivation mode.
      private boolean zip_compression
      Indicator which indicates whether the files should be compressed or not.

    • Field Detail

      • delay

        private final long delay
        The delay in milliseconds between the termination of one execution and the commencement of the next.

      • zip_compression

        private final boolean zip_compression
        Indicator which indicates whether the files should be compressed or not.

      • log_overwrite

        private final boolean log_overwrite
        Indicator which indicates whether the log should be overwritten for every new session or not.

      • log_suppress_debug

        private final boolean log_suppress_debug
        Indicator which indicates whether debug messages in the log should be suppressed or not.

      • archive_datafiles

        private final boolean archive_datafiles
        Indicator which indicates whether transmitted files should be archived or not.

      • language

        private final Properties.Language language
        Language to be used in the graphical user interface.

      • sedex_sender_id

        private final java.lang.String sedex_sender_id
        Sedex ID of the sender.

      • sedex_recipient_ids

        private final java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> sedex_recipient_ids
        Sedex IDs of the recipients.

      • sedex_recipient_labels

        private final java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> sedex_recipient_labels
        Labels of the recipients.

      • sedex_dir_outbox

        private final java.lang.String sedex_dir_outbox
        Outbox folder of the sedex adapter.

      • sedex_dir_receipts

        private final java.lang.String sedex_dir_receipts
        Receipts folder of the sedex adapter.

      • folder_results

        private java.lang.String folder_results
        Folder in which the end user puts the files with the results. Note: It is not a final field because it can be changed by the end user within the graphical user interface.

      • target_time

        private java.lang.String target_time
        Time when the transfer client will be activated under the autoactivation mode. Note: It is not a final field because it can be changed by the end user within the graphical user interface.

      • number_of_table_entries

        private final int number_of_table_entries
        Number of table entries.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Properties

        protected Properties​(long delay,
                     boolean zip_compression,
                     boolean log_overwrite,
                     boolean log_suppress_debug,
                     boolean archive_datafiles,
                     Properties.Language language,
                     java.lang.String sedex_sender_id,
                     java.lang.String sedex_recipient_id,
                     java.lang.String sedex_dir_outbox,
                     java.lang.String sedex_dir_receipts,
                     java.lang.String dir_results,
                     java.lang.String target_time,
                     int number_of_table_entries)
        Constructs a new properties object.
        Parameters:
        delay - Delay in milliseconds between the termination of one execution and the commencement of the next.
        zip_compression - Indicator which indicates whether the files should be compressed or not.
        log_overwrite - Indicator which indicates whether the log should be overwritten for every new session or not.
        log_suppress_debug - Indicator which indicates whether debug messages in the log should be suppressed or not.
        archive_datafiles - Indicator which indicates whether transmitted files should be archived or not.
        language - Language to be used in the graphical user interface.
        sedex_sender_id - Sedex ID of the sender.
        sedex_recipient_id - Sedex IDs of the recipients.
        sedex_dir_outbox - Sedex outbox folder.
        sedex_dir_receipts - Sedex receipts folder.
        dir_results - The folder of the result files.
        target_time - The time when the transfer-client should be automatically activated.
        number_of_table_entries - Number of table entries.
